TopicTitle: Game completely breaks and then crashes after loading back into craft

Articles.Content: Whenever I click fly on my craft on Duna, whether it be my kerbal in EVA or the Craft right next to him, the game will completely glitch out and eventually crash. This happens every time I load into my save, go to the tracking center and switch to the craft on Duna. I don't think that its my mods that are breaking my game, but I do use mods so I posted here.

it would be usefull if you post your ksp.log file, so others can take a look in what may be the problem here....

Edited July 4, 2020 by renejant

11 minutes ago, renejant said:

it would be usefull if you post your ksp.log file, so others can take a look in what may be the problem here....

KSP.log is only mildly helpful as it doesn't record that much detail. Try to find Player.log/Player.txt, it has much more information in it and is a lot more useful for finding the cause of a crash.

So I was able to sort of fix it by saving when the game was  glitching out, then close out the game and load back into that save, the only problem is that my kerbal is dead and the ship is going 25000 m/s heading out of the sun soi. So I guess this will have to do, I'll try to go into the files to revive Bob so I can still use him but Ill have to redo my mission.
